workshoptitle: Learn how to build a Java application with the Graal Development Kit for Micronaut, OCI MySQL HeatWave Database service and Secrets in OCI Vault

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second for LiveLabs. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Get Started with noVNC Remote Desktop
Lab 1: Clone the Sample Application Source Code
Lab 2: Provision an OCI MySQL HeatWave Database instance
Lab 4: Review the Application Source Code
Lab 5: Build and run the application against a local MySQL database in a container
Lab 6: Build and run a native executable and connect to the local MySQL database
Lab 7: Configure the OCI MySQL HeatWave Database instance and the Vault
Lab 8: Configure the application to use the MySQL HeatWave Database instance and the Vault
Lab 9: Build and Run the Application
Lab 10: Build and Run a Native Executable
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
